course.courseCompleteDescription: You have completed the course. Congratulations!

cody.greeting: Hello, I'm Cody. I'm here to help you learn how to code.

hero.title: Learning, Practicing, Mastering.
hero.subtitle: Write code. Pass tests. Move forward.

testFeedback.title: Instant Test Feedback
testFeedback.description: Get real-time feedback from automated tests as you code. See exactly what's working and what needs improvement before moving forward.
testFeedback.caption: Real-time test feedback helps you understand what's working and what needs improvement.

aiMentor.title: Stuck? Ask your AI Pair Programmer
aiMentor.description: Get instant help debugging your code and understanding concepts. Our integrated AI mentor is always ready to guide you through challenging problems.
aiMentor.userMessage1: Why is my list comprehension returning None?
aiMentor.botMessage1: It looks like you're using a list comprehension without a return expression. List comprehensions need to return a value.
aiMentor.botCode1: [x for x in range(10) if x % 2]
aiMentor.botCode2: [x * 2 for x in range(10) if x % 2]

quiz.title: Knowledge Checks
quiz.description: Interactive quizzes are intermixed with coding challenges to reinforce your understanding through active recall.
quiz.question: What is the primary purpose of a database index?
quiz.answerA: To store backup copies of data
quiz.answerB: To speed up query performance by creating a sorted data structure

curriculum.title: Comprehensive Curriculum
curriculum.description: Master backend engineering through structured tracks covering essential technologies and concepts.

python.title: Python
python.description: Master Python programming from fundamentals to advanced topics like async programming, decorators, and web frameworks.

nodejs.title: Node.js
nodejs.description: Build scalable backend applications with Node.js, Express, and modern JavaScript features including async/await and event-driven architecture.

java.title: Java
java.description: Learn enterprise Java development with Spring Boot, JVM internals, multithreading, and building robust REST APIs.

sql.title: SQL
sql.description: Master database design, query optimization, transactions, and advanced SQL features across PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite.
